mapper.insert: insert into coupon_rule(merchant_id, over, send, is_accumulation, quote, total_amount, valid_start_time, valid_end_time) values (#{merchantId}, #{over}, #{send}, #{isAccumulation}, #{quote}, #{totalAmount}, #{validStartTime}, #{validEndTime})
mapper.select: select coupon_rule_id, merchant_id, over, send, is_accumulation, quote, total_amount, sent_amount, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, create_time, status from coupon_rule where coupon_rule_id = #{ruleId}

select coupon_rule_id, merchant_id, over, send, is_accumulation, quote, total_amount, sent_amount, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, create_time, status from coupon_rule where status = 1 and valid_end_time > #{nowTime} and #{nowTime} > valid_start_time

select coupon_rule_id, merchant_id, over, send, is_accumulation, quote, total_amount, sent_amount, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, create_time, status from coupon_rule where merchant_id = #{merchantId}
mapper.update: update coupon_rule set status = -1 where coupon_rule_id = #{couponRuleId}
